articles.author: Pieter Haeck, Tom Bristow, Océane Herrero
articles.title: How the world stopped worrying and learned to love AI - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Politicians have shifted from AI regulation to innovation — and the industry loves it.
articles.content:
Macron, meanwhile, used the summit to announce the investment of 109 billion in AI in the coming years.
The French president also emphasized the need for the EU to become a leader in AI applications… [+1157 chars]
